snippet: Shiite Houthi rebels abducted the office director for Yemen’s president on Saturday in the capital in an effort to disrupt a meeting on a new constitution, which includes provisions to which the Houthis have strongly objected.
abstract: Shiite Houthi rebels abduct Ahmed Awad bin Mubarak, office director for Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi; Mubarak's whereabouts or condition are unknown.

byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Baghdad.

lead_paragraph: Shiite Houthi rebels abducted the office director for Yemen’s president on Saturday in the capital in an effort to disrupt a meeting on a new constitution, which includes provisions to which the Houthis have strongly objected.

headline.main: Houthi Rebels Abduct Aide to Yemen’s President
headline.print_headline: Houthi Rebels Abduct Aide to Yemen’s President
